snippet: New data shows that manipulated SATs accounted for more than three quarters of the results submitted by Claremont McKenna College since 2005.
abstract: New data shows that manipulated SATs accounted for more than three quarters of the results submitted by Claremont McKenna College since 2005.
lead_paragraph: More specific data about the numbers fudged by a top official at Claremont McKenna College showed that manipulation was so pervasive that more than three quarters of the SAT results reported in the past six years were altered.

headline.main: Manipulated SATs Were the Norm at Claremont McKenna
